tool_description:
eBay products search scraper for getting search products data.
You can choose the Location: the US Only,  North America , Europe , Asia, or Default.
You will get 25 products per page .
name: eBay products search scraper
title: eBay products search scraper

api_list.name: GET Search Products Data

required_parameters.name: Item_Location
required_parameters.description: Item Location :  europe  , north___america.    , asia  ,us__only  , default
